definition: to observe and form a judgment
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
to examine and judge the situation

sentences.english: The Prime Minister reviewed the situation with his Cabinet yesterday…
sentences.chinese: 昨天，首相和他的內閣對局勢進行了審度。

sentences.english: "Yes, " said the little prince, "but I can judge myself anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我嗎，隨便在什麼地方我都可以審度自己。

sentences.english: Perhaps it's because his other arguments don't stand up to close scrutiny.
sentences.chinese: 也許是因爲他其他的言論經不起仔細審度。
